## The Challenge {background-image="images/msai_gap_neon_1769666993144.png" background-opacity="0.15"}

### The Width of the Gap

- **89%** of organizations are investing in AI.
- Only **6%** of employees feel comfortable using it.
- **51%** of tech leaders report an AI skills shortage (Double from 18 months ago).

> "The largest and fastest-growing tech skills gap in over 15 years."
